posts.postText: Anyone play Aion and or and NCsoft games? I just re-downloaded Aion for the first time in months, looking for some peeps to play with

Isn't that pay to play?
If i'm gonna play a p2p game , i'd most likely just reactivate my WoW account if anything >.<
I played nexon stuff for a while. But if it's p2p I'll start up wow again and I know I will with cataclysm. (woohoo!!)

yeah i may start up wow again as well... maybe.

And yeah, i played maplestory for a while... i was actually debating playing that again
because i had a level 44 spearman, and I really wanted to get 70 so I could use the ultra badass dragon knight moves xD
